revised_title: Obituaries and Anniversaries: A Snapshot of the Royal Society in 1958
tldr: This article from the Royal Society's Notes and Records highlights obituaries of distinguished scientists in various fields, such as protozoa morphology, chemical kinetics, palaeontology, and natural products chemistry. It also celebrates the 50th anniversary of the Societe de Chimie Physique, sending congratulations and expressing appreciation for their work.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
